message_1: Suppose we have two sets A and B, where A = {1, 2, 3, 4} and B = {3, 4, 5, 6, 7}. Find the intersection of set A and set B.
message_2:
The intersection of two sets A and B is the set of elements that are common to both A and B. In this case, the intersection of set A and set B is:

A âˆ© B = {3, 4}
